```pddl
(:action untwist_hanger ; untwist the wire hanger and shape it into a circle using pliers
    :parameters (?hanger - hanger ?pliers - pliers ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?hanger ?loc) (at ?pliers ?loc) (shape ?hanger straight))
    :effect (and (shape ?hanger circular) (not (shape ?hanger straight)))
)

(:action gather_squares ; gather 3" squares of wax paper or crepe paper
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?squares - squares)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (at ?squares ?loc))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?squares))
)

(:action push_squares_away ; push squares away from the ends of the hanger
    :parameters (?p - player ?hanger - hanger ?squares - squares ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (at ?hanger ?loc) (inventory ?p ?squares) (shape ?hanger circular))
    :effect (and (squares_position ?squares away_from_ends))
)

(:action slide_squares ; slide squares back towards the joined ends of the hanger
    :parameters (?p - player ?hanger - hanger ?squares - squares ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (at ?hanger ?loc) (squares_position ?squares away_from_ends))
    :effect (and (squares_position ?squares towards_ends))
)

(:action finish_wreath ; finalize the wreath by scrunching the squares for fullness
    :parameters (?p - player ?hanger - hanger ?squares - squares ?wreath - wreath ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (at ?hanger ?loc) (squares_position ?squares towards_ends))
    :effect (and (status ?wreath completed) (not (status ?wreath in_progress)))
)
```
